content:
Sure! Here are a few more recommendations for exciting and fast-paced books:

1. Red Rising by Pierce Brown - This action-packed sci-fi novel follows a revolutionary seeking revenge against an oppressive regime that has enslaved his people. It's a riveting story of class struggle, rebellion, and adventure in space.

2. The Silent Patient by Alex Michaelides - This psychological thriller tells the story of a woman who murders her husband and then stops speaking entirely. A therapist becomes obsessed with uncovering the truth about why she did it.

3. Dark Matter by Blake Crouch - This mind-bending sci-fi thriller follows a physicist who is kidnapped and wakes up to find himself in a world where his life is completely different, and he must find a way back to his original reality.

4. The 7 1/2 Deaths of Evelyn Hardcastle by Stuart Turton - This innovative murder mystery follows a man who wakes up in a different body every day, tasked with solving the murder of Evelyn Hardcastle. It's a wild ride full of twists and turns.

5. Kill Creek by Scott Thomas - This horror novel follows four popular horror writers who are invited to spend the night in a haunted house. It's a spine-tingling story that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

I hope these recommendations are more to your liking!
